alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 1:20PM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 8 AM MDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins
